articles.author: Longjam Dineshwori
articles.title: WHO identifies 12 African countries for roll out of first-ever malaria vaccine | TheHealthSite.com - TheHealthSite
articles.description: These 12 African countries are set to receive 18 million doses of the first-ever malaria vaccine over the next two years. TheHealthSite.com
articles.content:
Another malaria vaccine, R21/Matrix-M, is also expected to be approved by WHO soon. 
These 12 African countries are set to receive the first doses of the malaria vaccine during the last quarter of 2… [+3212 chars]
